channel.title: When you log off stay where u are please help!
channel.description: Please help with this if you know. Im using dodian based source 317 and when you log in you start in yanille thats all good, but when you tele to lets say anywhere or walk anywhere and then u log out and log back in it brings u back to yanille i dont want it like that i want it to keep u where u logged off at. How do i fix this? Thanks

item.title: When you log off stay where u are please help!
item.dc:creator: @boxhad boxhad
item.description:

How do i fix this? Thanks
